mapper.select: select id, purchase_id, sku_id, sku_num, sku_price, ware_id, status from wms_purchase_detail where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into wms_purchase_detail(purchase_id, sku_id, sku_num, sku_price, ware_id, status) values (#{purchaseId}, #{skuId}, #{skuNum}, #{skuPrice}, #{wareId}, #{status})

insert into wms_purchase_detail(purchase_id, sku_id, sku_num, sku_price, ware_id, status) values
(#{entity.purchaseId}, #{entity.skuId}, #{entity.skuNum}, #{entity.skuPrice}, #{entity.wareId}, #{entity.status})

insert into wms_purchase_detail(purchase_id, sku_id, sku_num, sku_price, ware_id, status) values
(#{entity.purchaseId}, #{entity.skuId}, #{entity.skuNum}, #{entity.skuPrice}, #{entity.wareId}, #{entity.status})
on duplicate key update purchase_id = values(purchase_id), sku_id = values(sku_id), sku_num = values(sku_num), sku_price = values(sku_price), ware_id = values(ware_id), status = values(status)
mapper.update:
update wms_purchase_detail
purchase_id = #{purchaseId},
sku_id = #{skuId},
sku_num = #{skuNum},
sku_price = #{skuPrice},
ware_id = #{wareId},
status = #{status},
where id = #{id}
